Parental Consent
Chatstasy takes children’s privacy seriously. In order to activate some of the premium features of this App, you need to be 13 years of age or over. If you are younger than 13 years of age, you need to get your parent or guardian’s consent before registering the App. I am under 13 years of age Under 13 years old Parental Consent Not Received Parent/Guardian Email ID:

Select this option if you do not want this image changed directly by this contact Select this option to make this contact your emergency contact. It will be tagged with a red + and placed in front of other non emergency contact buttons for easy access.
We want this information to personalize your experience Creating Your profile is real simple. It Will take just a minute of your time Please provide your name in a language of your choice. This will be used for all-app notification cancel Please be aware that providing an invalid number or the number of another user is against the Terms of Use. Please provide the number of this mobile phone. Since this is an App for commmunication, it is important you provide the correct phone #. Please provide your profile image. This image will be used for your chat button on other\'s phone. You can always change this any time Make this my default chat button image Select this box if you are a returning user and would like to recover your backup When selected, your image will auto populate when others create your chat button Creating your profile is free and is necessary to use this App. Please return when you are ready Please select a button image The Phone # has been registered under a different device Please check and make sure it belongs to you. If you are a returning user, please press the back key and select the Returning User box and continue. If you are a new user, please use the SMS option below to continue. Send SMS Create Profile Please Provide your previous Cloud Backup Key to recover your backup data Please Provide your previous Cloud Backup Key to recover your backup data Cloud Backup key Your Cloud Backup key can be found in your email folder if you had provided a valid email ID earlier. If you do not remember, please register as a new user by unchecking the returning User Flag in the previous screen. OLD PHONE # (with country code) Welcome Back to !Do you want to recover your cloud backup? returning user Congratulations! User profile created. Your backup key is =\"backup_key\".\nWe recommend you store the backup key in a safe place outside of this phone to help recover your contacts on a new phone. Do you like to notify all =\"app_users\" users from your contact list?
